description:
Touya visits the capital city of the Regulus Empire to stock some books for the library café, Moon Reader, only to witness the town engulfed in the flames of war.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aufruhr in der Hauptstadt und die Kaiserprinzessin
Teito Douran, Soshite Teikoku no Hime.
Troubles dans la capitale et princesse impériale.
Upheaval in the Capital and an Imperial Princess
帝都動乱, そして帝国の姫.
